title: Calculate Child Tax Credit
description: A married couple with two qualifying children needs their Child Tax Credit calculated.

tasks.description: Enter the personal and financial information for the couple and their two children.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly inputs all taxpayer and dependent data.

tasks.description: Verify that the children meet all the eligibility tests for the Child Tax Credit.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms both children are qualifying dependents for the credit.

tasks.description: Calculate the total Child Tax Credit amount, including any phase-outs based on income.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly calculates the maximum allowable credit for the family.
